attributes.action: Ban the sale of 4 x 4 cars to people who live in cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global climate change is the biggest threat to humanity. This country is in danger of not meeting the desired decrease in output of C02 emmissions to help prevent global warming. Partly due to the trend of people purchasing gas guzzling cars. if the government were serious about cutting greenhouse gasses it would ban these cars. They also endanger the lives of cyclists and pedestrians.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=4x4
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
